name: Blood Seeker
originalText: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may have that player lose 1 life.

rulings.text: Life loss is not the same as damage. Blood Seeker’s ability will not cause creatures with bloodthirst to enter the battlefield with +1/+1 counters.

text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may have that player lose 1 life.
